components/category/sidebar:
{{!-- {{#if category.subcategories}}

{{category.name}}

    {{#each category.subcategories}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}} --}} {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}} {{> components/faceted-search/index category}} {{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{lang "category.filters"}}
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#if items}}
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{title}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{lang "category.items" NUM=count}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-more'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{title}}
{{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#if items}}
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{title}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{lang 'search.faceted.rating.and-up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{count}}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/faceted-search: {{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
